attributes.description:
2014 BMW X3 2.0D ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 139000 km. Color: Maroon Price: R189, 995 Neg


BLACKLISTED ARE ALSO WELCOME TO APPLY FOR FINANCE


Features: AUTOMATIC, LEATHER NICE SEAT INTERIOR As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Rear Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tire, Wheel, 18’’ inch Meg’s, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition, Spotless, Nice In Color Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tires, Alloy Wheel's, Spotlights In Front, Alarm and Mobilize Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Aircon, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.1 liter per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle.

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090. Operating hours are from 08:00 till 17:00 Mon - Fri and 08:00 till 14:00 Sat. ALTERNATIVE CONTACT: CALL 011 485 1186 OR WHATS APP 0784890344, 0810023905

attributes.description: Action Ford Modimolle is a proud member of CFAO Motors South Africa. Our network re-present us across the country with the opportunity to leave our footprint in various brands. We pride ourselves to the top level of quality service that is well known within Ford SA's extremely high standards in our range of New and Approved Pre - Owned vehicles. Our well trained Team of Sales Executive's eagerly await your request to assist and find the right vehicle to fit your personal needs, with our expert onsite Business Manager that will structure the best possible deal to suit your financial needs. Our top notch Technical Team and Parts department will cater for your every need and assist with friendly service in our ongoing effort to treat you, our best asset, with care and professionalism, to ensure our service levels meet with your high demand! We think this to be a good time for you to contact us!
